uni.bielefeld.cmg.sparkhit.io

Interface NGSfileUnitBuffer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FastqUnitBuffer

    public interface NGSfileUnitBuffer
    This is an interface for managing input NGS (next generation sequencing) files via different input buffers.
    See Also:

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReadUnit(readInfo read, int unitsMark)
      This is an abstract method for buffering input fastq units.

    • Method Detail

      • addReadUnit

        void addReadUnit(readInfo read,
               int unitsMark)
        This is an abstract method for buffering input fastq units.
        Parameters:
        read - readInfo a type of data structure class describing a sequencing read.
        unitsMark - a integer marker counting input fastq units for the buffer.
